verses.name: Genesis 37:21
verses.text: And Reuben heard it, and he delivered him out of their hands; and said, Let us not kill him.

verses.name: Genesis 37:22
verses.text: And Reuben said unto them, Shed no blood, but cast him into this pit that is in the wilderness, and lay no hand upon him; that he might rid him out of their hands, to deliver him to his father again.

verses.name: Genesis 37:23
verses.text: And it came to pass, when Joseph was come unto his brethren, that they stript Joseph out of his coat, his coat of many colours that was on him;
